definitions.definition: Leave , formal permission for some action, ( originally and particularly ) :

subdefinitions.definition: ( obsolete ) Formal permission to leave ; a passport .

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) Formal dismissal ; ( figurative ) any dismissal; ( originally & particularly humorously ironic ) abrupt dismissal without ceremony .
( obsolete ) Formal leavetaking ; ( figurative ) any farewell .
( obsolete , Scotland ) A fee paid to make another go away , ( particularly ) alms to a persistent beggar .
( archaic ) A bow , curtsey , or other gesture ( originally ) made at departure but ( later ) including at greeting or in obeissance or respect .

main_definition: Leave , formal permission for some action, ( originally and particularly ) :
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Formal dismissal ; ( figurative ) any dismissal; ( originally & particularly humorously ironic ) abrupt dismissal without ceremony .
( obsolete ) Formal leavetaking ; ( figurative ) any farewell .
( obsolete , Scotland ) A fee paid to make another go away , ( particularly ) alms to a persistent beggar .
( archaic ) A bow , curtsey , or other gesture ( originally ) made at departure but ( later ) including at greeting or in obeissance or respect .

definitions.definition: A type of thick rice porridge or soup , sometimes prepared with vegetables and/or meat .

main_definition: ( Asian cooking ) A type of thick rice porridge or soup , sometimes prepared with vegetables and/or meat .
